## Tables in tables in tables

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Cards (one, two, many)                                                                               |
+============================+=========================================================================+
| One                        | +---------------------------+------------------------+                  |
|                            | | A0                        | B0                     |                  |
|                            | +===========================+========================+                  |
|                            | | A1                        | B1                     |                  |
|                            | +---------------------------+------------------------+                  |
|                            | | some text with a \| in it | \| or at the beginning |                  |
|                            | +----------------------------------------------------+                  |
|                            | | or some in code: `a \+ b = c`.                     |                  |
|                            | +----------------------------------------------------+                  |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| two                        | three                                                                   |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| +---------------------------+------------------------+                                               |
| | A0                        | B0                     |                                               |
| +===========================+========================+                                               |
| | A1                        | B1                     |                                               |
| +---------------------------+------------------------+                                               |
| | some text with a \| in it | \| or at the beginning |                                               |
| +----------------------------------------------------+                                               |
| | or some in code: `a \+ b = c`.                     |                                               |
| +----------------------------------------------------+                                               |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| four                       | five                                                                    |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| nested                     | +---------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
|                            | | nested tables are fun!                                              | |
|                            | +============+========================================================+ |
|                            | | r0         | +---------------------------+------------------------+ | |
|                            | |            | | A0                        | B0                     | | |
|                            | +------------| +===========================+========================+ | |
|                            | | r1         | | A1                        | B1                     | | |
|                            | |            | +---------------------------+------------------------+ | |
|                            | |            | | some text with a \| in it | \| or at the beginning | | |
|                            | +------------| +----------------------------------------------------+ | |
|                            | | r2         | | or some in code: `a \+ b = c`.                     | | |
|                            | |            | +----------------------------------------------------+ | |
|                            | +------------+--------------------------------------------------------+ |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
